biotools.summary: PREDITOR predicts torsion angles in proteins from NMR chemical shift data and sequence homology.  PREDITOR combines sequence alignment methods with advanced chemical shift analysis techniques to generate its torsion angle predictions.

bioschemas.name: PREDITOR
bioschemas.summary: PREDITOR predicts torsion angles in proteins from NMR chemical shift data and sequence homology.  PREDITOR combines sequence alignment methods with advanced chemical shift analysis techniques to generate its torsion angle predictions.
